EffectsToChat.SettingChatMessagePermissionHint: This defines the minimum permission level to see chat messages when effects are applied or removed.
EffectsToChat.SettingShowEffectDescriptionHint: This defines when to show effect descriptions in the chat message.
EffectsToChat.SendChatToActorOwnerHint: If enabled, this will send effect chat messages to the users that own the affected actor, even if they would otherwise not have permission to see it.
